divs: Sighting DetailsI took about 4 pics several seconds apart of a fire in Acton, CA. I'm in Tujunga and we can see the fire just popping over the ridge here at 7:20pm when I took the pics. I didn't notice the black object until I showed them to my husband. However it only appeared in that single pic and we've been watching intently to see if maybe it was a helicopter but have not seen any whatsoever in the sky. Cause of fire is supposedly lightning and it's 102 degrees + right now.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were 2 other sightings in Los Angeles on or around September 2nd 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
